item.title: Page launched
item.description: This page has just been launched. Hopefully more will follow soon…

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am Dominik. I live in Vienna. I take photos and I study psychology. Photography Articles 2021-02-21: Dimitris Makrygiannakis talks with Dominik Pegler (burnmyeye.org) 2020-08-09: “You have no subject? Take a photo on the street!” (index.hu)

item.title: Contact
item.description: For collaboration inquiries, please contact me at: Email dominikpegler@posteo.org Code GitHub Social Media Instagram Flickr LinkedIn Norma Photography Collective www.normanormanorma.org
